item.title: 6、SpringSecurity和oauth2踩坑集合（SpringSecurity）
item.description: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: There is no PasswordEncoder mapped for the id “null” auth2配置授权服务报错 @Override public void configure(ClientDetailsServiceConfigurer clients) throws Exception { //配置两个客户端,一个用于password认证一个用于client认证 clients.inMemory().withClient("client_2") .authorizedGrantTypes("password","refresh_token") .accessTokenValiditySeconds(3600)

item.title: mysql数据备份
